name: Global uniques
uniques: [-25]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-10] and [0] Happiness>
[-75]% growth [in all cities] <when between [-15] and [-11] Happiness>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when below [-15] Happiness>
[-50]% [Production] [in all cities] <when below [-15] Happiness>
Rebel units may spawn <when below [-15] Happiness>
Cannot build [Settler] units <when below [-10] Happiness>
Provides [1] [Warfare Aversion Level] <when at war>
Provides [1] [Warfare Aversion Level]  <when below [0] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
Instantly consumes [10] [Warfare Aversion Level] <upon conquering a city> <when above [10] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
Provides [-1] [Warfare Aversion Level] <when not at war> <when above [0] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
Provides [-1] [Warfare Aversion Level] <when not at war> <when above [10] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
Provides [-1] [Warfare Aversion Level] <when not at war> <when above [30] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
Provides [-1] [Warfare Aversion Level] <when not at war> <when above [50] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
Provides [-1] [Warfare Aversion Level] <when not at war> <when above [70] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
Provides [-1] [Warfare Aversion Level] <when not at war> <when above [100] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
[+10]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when above [10] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
[-15]% [Gold] <when above [30] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
[+5]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when above [30] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
[-5]% [Gold] <when above [50] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
[-20]% [Production] [in all cities] <when above [50] [Warfare Aversion Level]>

Rebel units may spawn <when above [70] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
[-5]% [Gold] <when above [100] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
[-5]% [Production] [in all cities] <when above [100] [Warfare Aversion Level]>
[+5]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities] <when above [100] [Warfare Aversion Level]>

Enables [Great Admiral] units to enter ocean tiles
Enables [Lee Sunshin] units to enter ocean tiles
Triggers a [New Era] event <upon entering a new era>
